summary: The document is an identification form related to the JFK assassination system, dated 01/20/98, marked as 'UNCLASSIFIED' and 'RELEASED WITH DELETIONS'. It details personal and employment information about David R. Fromer, including his birth date, addresses, employment history, and questions regarding foreign connections and employment by firms with US government contracts. The document suggests a background check or security clearance process, and it was last reviewed on 03/07/95.
key_findings: The document is part of a series related to DOD-affiliated personnel incident investigations.
It contains personal and employment information about David R. Fromer, including his addresses from 12th birthday or during the last 15 years.
Questions regarding foreign connections, interests, employment, military service, and travel are included, suggesting a background check or security clearance process.
The document's classification is 'UNCLASSIFIED', and it was last reviewed on 03/07/95.
